item.title: Need Quck Help [Delta] REP+
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

public void openDuel() { if (playerRights >= 1) { sM("You are not allowed to duel!"); } else { stakerecieved = false; offeredItems.clear(); otherOfferedItems.clear(); ResetDuelEquips(); ResetDuelRules(); RefreshDuelRules(); refreshDuelScreen(); inDuel = true; client other = getClient(duel_with); sendQuest("Dueling with: " + other.playerName + " (level-" + other.combatLevel + ")", 6671); sendQuest("", 6684); sendFrame248(6575, 3321); resetItems(3322); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Need Quck Help [Delta] REP+
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

If I was wanting to try that, I would add something close to this. public void openDuel() && playerRights <= 0 { stakerecieved = false; offeredItems.clear(); otherOfferedItems.clear(); ResetDuelEquips(); ResetDuelRules(); RefreshDuelRules(); refreshDuelScreen(); inDuel = true; client other = getClient(duel_with); sendQuest("Dueling with: " + other.playerName + " (level-" + other.combatLevel + ")", 6671); sendQuest("", 6684); sendFrame248(6575, 3321); resetItems(3322); }
Hope this helps.

Read full topic
